## isEmpty() function

返回判断的数据是否为空

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isEmpty(value: any): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

value


</td><td>

any


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

布尔值，值为空 (空数组或空对象) 或者值为假 (例如 null、undefined、false、0、空字符串、set和map的大小),则返回true；否则为false

## Example


```JavaScript
 let s = new Set(); isEmpty(s) => true
 let obj ={};  isEmpty(obj) => true
 let arr = ['1', {a: '12'}]; isEmpty(arr) => false
```
